meaning_str.bing:
n. 经济；节约；经济制度；节省
网络. 经济性；经济型；经济学

经济；节约；经济制度；节省

经济；经济结构；经济制度；节约；省俭；经济情况；经济舱位组织；系统；简练；干净利落
经济的；合算的；低成本的；节能的；效率高的；实惠的；简约的；（客机、车、船等的舱位）经济的；二等的
（在客机、车、船上）乘坐经济舱位

1.en: It was able to maintain that level even as the economy doubled in size during the country's boom years of the 1970s and '80s.
1.cn: 日本能保持那个水平即使在国家经济翻倍的增长的繁荣的20世纪70和80年代。

2.en: At a time when our economy is still recovering from the Great Recession, our top priority has to be jobs and growth.
2.cn: 在这个我们的经济仍从大萧条中恢复的时刻，我们的第一要务只能是就业和增长。

3.en: The letter said the coalition should promote a green economy with "urgency and resolve" if it was to honour its promise.
3.cn: 信中说，联合政府如果尊重自己的许诺，就应该“迅速而果断地”推动绿色经济。

0.en: We didn't run your economy into the ground. You did.
0.cn: 不是我们把你们的经济搞砸的，是你自己。

1.en: Is not the digital economy, which I called data economy, and everything is going to be changed.
1.cn: 不仅仅是数字经济，我叫它数据经济，所有的东西都会被改变。

2.en: The period between 1979 and 1982 was one of extreme turbulence, for the global economy, the markets, and for me. And I believed that the US economy, with the world economy tied to it, was headed toward a catastrophe.
2.cn: 1979年到1982年这段时间都是充满颠簸的几年，对于国际经济市场和我来说。我那时相信美国经济，带着全球的经济，正向灾难方向发展。

3.en: Flight to D.C. Tonight. Couple of days there. Go. Coach. No extra legroom. Economy plus. Coach!
3.cn: 飞往华盛顿的机，今晚就走，在那儿待上几天。去吧，坐经济舱，不加空间。豪华经济舱。经济舱！

4.en: An economy is a tricky thing to control and governments are always trying to figure out how to do it.
4.cn: 经济是管理起来十分棘手的系统，而政府总是能出掌控经济的办法。

5.en: And if that day comes, that day will (be) called D-economy.
5.cn: 如果这个结合实现，那才能被称作D经济。

6.en: But the gains of a growing economy aren't yet felt by everyone.
6.cn: 但经济发展的红利并不是每个人都能感受得到。

7.en: So far this year, our economy has created 2.65 million new jobs.
7.cn: 今年以来，我们的经济已经创造了265万新的就业岗位。

8.en: Our economy had plummeted at a rate of 8% in a single quarter part of the fastest economic decline any time in the last half century.
8.cn: 近一个季度的时间经济就下滑8%，这是过去半个世纪以来少有的经济下滑速度。

9.en: Shoring up the economy, securing our nation from ICO and reducing unemployment.
9.cn: 提振经济，保护我国不受哈里发国攻击还要降低失业率。

10.en: Independent experts said it would grow our economy, and shrink our deficits.
10.cn: 独立专家说这会促进我们的经济增长，能够减少我们的赤字。

11.en: A shootout beneath the beating heart of the American economy, and you don't know anything about it?
11.cn: 在美国经济的心脏重地发生枪战，你居然一无所知？

12.en: It's been a major boost to our economy and a profound change to our auto industry.
12.cn: 成为了我们经济的巨大推动力量，并促进了我国汽车行业的深化改革。

13.en: So what is this thing you're working on? It's all to do with the rural economy. Very hush-hush.
13.cn: 话说回来，你这次来到底在忙什么?与乡村经济有关，非常机密。

14.en: Thanks to the work we've all put in our economy has come a long way these past six years.
14.cn: 多亏了我们所做的所有工作，我们的经济在过去的六年里有了长足的进展。

15.en: To build a stronger middle class in today's changing economy we've got to keep fighting.
15.cn: 为了在当今变革的经济形势中打造更强大的中产阶级，我们需要不断的斗争。

16.en: And that grows the economy for everyone. The bottom line is, America deserves a raise.
16.cn: 而这也将促进经济增长惠及所有人。我们的底线就是，美国应该提高工资标准。

17.en: Along with our allies, we will support the people of Ukraine as they develop their democracy and economy.
17.cn: 与我们的盟国一起，我们将支持乌克兰人民发展他们的民主和经济。

18.en: Let's do this because it would make our economy stronger and make sure that growth is shared.
18.cn: 让我们去这样做，因为这将让我们的经济更加壮大并确保这样的增长能够被分享。

19.en: Its economy is the largest on earth and it makes and exports more goods than anywhere else on the globe.
19.cn: 中国是地球上的最大的经济体，生产和出口的商品比全球其它任何地方都多。
